description: Market Potential represents the total potential market size for a given technology, application, or segment.
Addressable Market represents the portion of the market potential that can realistically be addressed or captured.
Penetration measures the percentage of the addressable market that has been captured or is expected to be captured.
Shipments represents the number of units shipped or delivered during a specific time period.
Installed Base represents the total number of units currently in use or installed in the market.
Prices represents the average selling prices or price trends for products or services in the market.
Revenues represents the total revenue generated or projected to be generated from sales in the market.
